text:
Probably excessive chewing of hard chews. My shelter girl came to me with all her front teeth cracked off and her canines are slivers. 

We had to have 12 teeth removed and the canines are at risk for horizontal fractures. No hard chews allowed basically.
While looks are a consideration, a dog that matches your lifestyle is more important. Fill out the breed questionnaire and maybe people can point you to something that matches looks and lifestyle.
